headline: Technical Perspective: Applying Design-Space Exploration to Quantum Architectures
description: <p>&quot;Toward Systematic Architectural Design of Near-Term Trapped Ion Quantum Computers&quot; presents a study on scaling trapped-ion quantum architectures, and challenges the conventional wisdom of experimentalists in the field.</p>
headline_zh-Hans: 技术视角。将设计空间探索应用于量子架构
headline_zh-Hant: 技術視角。將設計空間探索應用於量子架構
description_zh-Hans: <p>&quot;Toward Systematic Architectural Design of Near-Term Trapped Ion Quantum Computers&quot;提出了一项关于扩展困顿离子量子架构的研究，并对该领域实验者的传统智慧提出了挑战。
description_zh-Hant: <p>&quot;Toward Systematic Architectural Design of Near-Term Trapped Ion Quantum Computers&quot;提出了一項關於擴展困頓離子量子架構的研究，並對該領域實驗者的傳統智慧提出了挑戰。
